quote_last: . That didn’t seem so very late in the mood I was in. I put on my dressing-gown and took my pocket torch with me and went to Sally’s room.”
title: Cover Her Face
author: P.D. James

quote_last: ,” he said. Wells nodded. By the old woman’s calendar I’ve got three more minutes.
title: No Country for Old Men
author: Cormac McCarthy
